name: Nate's Plates
description:
A chaotic game about a hungry octopus named Nate.

Potates and tomates are Nate’s faves, 

But Eight-Armed Nate hates dirty plates. 

Nate also hates poison and nuclear waste.

When Nate gets irate you’ll meet an ill fate.

Clear lots of plates to make your score great!

The only controls are WASD for Nate's left tentacle and IJKL for Nate's right tentacle.

Glhf!

- Made by Courtland, Dustin and Luke.
